issue.title: ros camera plugin not publishing camera_info topic

content.raw:
The missing line was previoulsy in the parent class function 


```
#!c++
GazeboRosCameraUtils::CameraQueueThread()
```
After creating **gazebo_ros_multi_camera.cpp** the *PublishCameraInfo()* call was moved to the derived class methods 


```
#!c++
GazeboRosMultiCamera::OnNewFrameLeft()
GazeboRosMultiCamera::OnNewFrameRight()
```
but it was not moved to 


```
#!c++
GazeboRosCamera::OnNewFrame()
```
content.html:
The missing line was previoulsy in the parent class function 

GazeboRosCameraUtils::CameraQueueThread()

After creating gazebo_ros_multi_camera.cpp the PublishCameraInfo() call was moved to the derived class methods 

GazeboRosMultiCamera::OnNewFrameLeft()
GazeboRosMultiCamera::OnNewFrameRight()

but it was not moved to 

GazeboRosCamera::OnNewFrame()
